name: World Runner (Thetha)
description:
World Runner is a 2D endless runner with powerups and various world themes.  Chase a high score!

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift - Dash (If available)
  • F - Forward attack (destroy projectiles) 
  • Down + F - Down Attack (bounce off hazards)
Credits
  • Made in GameMaker Studio 2
  • Programming by Thetha
  • Animated Pixel Adventurer by  rvros
  • Animated traps and obstacles by Irina Mir (irmirx)
  • Icons by various authors on Game-icons.net under CC BY 3.0
  • Platform Assets from World Tilesets - GameMaker Asset Bundle
  • Backgrounds from World Backgrounds - GameMaker Asset Bundle
  • Font 'Retro Gaming' by Daymarius
